translated: John Fitzgerald Kennedy, was born May 29, 1917 in Brookline (Massachusetts) and died November 22, 1963 in Dallas (Texas), better known by the acronym JFK, is a politician and a statesman of the United States.
original: John Fitzgerald Kennedy, né le 29 mai 1917 à Brookline (Massachusetts) et mort le 22 novembre 1963 à Dallas (Texas), plus connu sous l'acronyme JFK, est un homme politique et un homme d'État des États-Unis.
